CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 27, 1961, pg. A5 reads: "Hollywood Club - The popular Hollywood Social and Literary Club of Clairton, celebrated its 27th anniversary, recently, with a gala affair in the club headquarters. Dr. C.C. Bookert, president of the club, is surrounded by some of the club members and five charming young women.  First row, left to right: Miss Sue Goorme, Mrs. Ruth Caldwell, Mrs. Jewell Watts, Van Lucas, Mrs. Vernon Pressley, Tom Smith and MRs. Helen Ransom.  Back row, left to right: John Solomon, Hillary Luckey, Ernest Starks, Dr. Bookert, Ernest Webb, Harry Pressley, Marbro Bellamy and Lacree Fant. - Harris photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Hollywood Social and Literary Club members, first row from left: Sue Goorme, Ruth Caldwell, Jewell Watts, Van Lucas, Vernon Pressley, Tom Smith, and Helen Ransom; back row: John Solomon, Hillary Luckey, Ernest Starks, Dr. C. C. Bookert, Ernest Webb, Harry Pressley, Marbro Bellamy, and Lacree Fant, posed in club headquarters, Clairton
